name: Hang Slime
description:
You are agent Slimuel St. Fernando!

The Slime Bag production factory
has gone into Ludicrous production mode...
Your mission: traverse the shipyard and make 
your way into the slime bag to switch off the
production line before there's slime EVERYWHERE!

A & D to move, SPACE to jump, LEFT-CLICK on blocks
and pink platforms to use your slime whip.

This game was created for the Slime Jam.  Some content from the provided asset pack was used.  Camera shake was created using EZ Camera Shaker.  All music created in Bosca Ceoil.
